name: cyberprogames
description: A website with a purpose of hosting various games ranging from just-for-fun to game to learning about programming/computer science. This project was created as part of our semester long project in the ITEC 4860 course to get us comfortable with the MERN stack and deploy a full-stack web application.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
